document.full_text: mexico's state-run oil company pemex evacuated 300 workers from its only oil port on the pacific coast on friday after a tsunami warning rippled down latin america following a massive earthquake in japan.
document.title: mexico evacuates pacific oil port, refinery safe
lines_and_colors: mexico's state-run oil company pemex evacuated 300 workers from its only oil port on the pacific coast on friday after a tsunami warning rippled down latin america following a massive earthquake in japan.
